data.eml:eml: Contribution to the Trichoptera fauna of the river La Vieja, Bogotá, Colombia (Insecta: Trichoptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mey, Wolfram, Ospina-Torres, Rodulfo (2018): Contribution to the Trichoptera fauna of the river La Vieja, Bogotá, Colombia (Insecta: Trichoptera). Zootaxa 4504 (1): 23-40, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4504.1.2
